page.title: 09Penhaven Tourist Park
page.content: This is situated on the B3273 road which runs from St.Austell to Mevagissey.The park has an office, a shop, a toilet and shower block, and three fields.There are 150 spaces in the main field,whilst the other two fields have about 50 pitches each. At maximum, the site can cater for about 1000 people each night. The caravan and camping season begins in April,when Â£2.50 is charged for a pitch.By the height of the season the cost per pitch rises to Â£6 per night, decressing again towards October. Two families run the site as a private business,involving 7 people.In this area there are five other camping sites these are at:-Pentewan Sands, Molingey,Tregorick,Trewhiddle and Sun Valley.
